name: Animina
description:
An archive of a questionably designed game where nature fights back against the pollution caused by humanity, by reflecting their hazards back at them!

Controls:

AD to move left and right.

W to Jump (and use the Bird and Squirrel's special ability).

Mouse to aim your reflector (tail or  head).

Left Mouse Button to use the Lizard's dash.

Credits:

Chief Engineer - Archibald Faugno

Artist and Secondary Engineer - William Erignac

Sound Designer and Playtester - Stephen Yamasaki

See the project on Github: https://github.com/werignac/Environmental-Shenanigans
